definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Like marsupial mammals, Hutts nurse their young Huttlets in special brood pouches.
sentences.chinese: 他们像有袋类哺乳动物，在育婴袋里抚育幼崽。

sentences.english: Axons of the central nervous system in adult mammals do not regenerate spontaneously after axotomy.
sentences.chinese: 成年哺乳动物的中枢神经受伤后无法自行再生。

sentences.english: Small catlike predatory mammals of warmer parts of the Old World.
sentences.chinese: 东半球温暖地区的象猫的小型食肉哺乳动物。

sentences.english: Blastocystis hominis is a unicellular protozoan commonly found in the intestinal tract of human and mammal.
sentences.chinese: 人芽囊原虫是一种常见的人和哺乳动物肠道寄生原虫。

sentences.english: Foamy viruses infect some mammals, including monkeys and apes.
sentences.chinese: 泡沫病毒可以感染某些哺乳动物，包括猴子和猿类。

sentences.english: Rodents are small mammals with large front teeth.
sentences.chinese: 啮齿目动物是长着大门齿的小哺乳动物。

sentences.english: Mammalian cells make only the single-stranded variety.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物细胞只能产生单链RNA。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the function of sex- determining gene of the mammal.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解哺乳动物性别决定基因的作用与功能。

sentences.english: Other mammals and human infants rely on brown fat to keep warm.
sentences.chinese: 婴儿，还有其它哺乳动物都靠这种脂肪组织来产热。

sentences.english: The platypus and the echidna are egg-laying mammals.
sentences.chinese: 鸭嘴兽和针鼹是产卵哺乳动物。

sentences.english: African elephants are the largest of Earth's land mammals.
sentences.chinese: 非洲象是地球上最大的陆生哺乳动物。

sentences.english: A hoofed mammal of the order Perissodactyla.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳是哺乳动物的本能。

sentences.english: Lymphocyte production in mammals originates in the bone marrow.
sentences.chinese: 哺乳动物淋巴细胞在骨髓产生。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of Polygonum multiflorum Thunb. extract on the skin stable state of mammal.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究何首乌提取物对哺乳动物皮肤稳态的影响。

sentences.english: Humpback whales hold the world's record for longest mammalian voyage.
sentences.chinese: 座头鲸保持著世界上哺乳动物中迁徙距离最长的记录。

definition: mammals/also written 哺乳動物|哺乳动物
reptiles/also written 爬行動物|爬行动物
bony fishes/Osteichthyes (taxonomic class including most fish)
